screen_desc: The screen shows the "Messenger Lite" app installed on a smartphone, with options to open it. It also suggests other apps like Microsoft OneDrive, Microsoft Teams, Signal Private Messenger, and similar applications such as Messenger Kids, Messenger Color, Messenger SMS & MMS, and Messenger.
action_think: The user wants to open the 'Messenger Lite' app and then perform a login or forgot password action. The app is already installed and the 'Open' button is available.
action_plan: Enter the email or phone number associated with the account
action_desc: click on the 'Open' button located at the top-right of the 'Messenger Lite' app
action_result: By clicking the "Open" button, you have opened the "Messenger Lite" app. This is a step towards completing your request, as you can now log in to the app where you can select "Forgot Password" to proceed with your request.
prev_action_result: By clicking on the "Install" button, the app "Messenger Lite" has been successfully installed. The next step is to open the app, which can be done by tapping on the "Open" button located at the top right. Once the app is opened, the user can proceed to login. If the app is not already installed, the user will be prompted to install it. After the app is installed, the user can select "forgot password" to reset their password. This action has made progress towards the user request.
